DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : Optimal eye-hand coordination important volleyball player . Neck disorder may affect neck function subsequently eye-hand coordination . The purpose study explore vertical stability training effect coordination upper extremity female volleyball player . Methods : This study survey 25 player volleyball team , randomly assign group A ( train 1st ) group B ( train 2nd ) . The group A include 13 volleyball player group B include 12 . Eye-hand coordination test self-developed hand-stroking table device stay time motion time upper extremity determine . There two test mode , regular random . Motion time electric probe move target sensor stay time electric probe stay target sensor collect mode , session train end 2nd session . In 1st session training , group A start vertical stability train group B control train six week . In 2nd session training , train program shift group A B another six week .
DOC.brief_title: Vertical Stability Training Effects Eye-Hand Coordination Female Volleyball Players
DOC.criteria: Female Volleyball Players ca n't party training
